message: Let's start fair. I'll take 60% and you get 40%.  This is a good starting point.
I think we can both do better. Let's start with a more even split - I'll take 55% and you get 45%. This way we can both have a good starting point.
Let's be reasonable here.  Since inflation is hurting us both, a 50/50 split is the fairest option. It's time to stop fighting and share the money equally.
